problem.description: Usually first parameter of a method is named 'self'
Method must have a first parameter, usually called 'self'
First parameter of a non-static method must not be a tuple
Usually first parameter of such methods is named 'cls'
Usually first parameter of such methods is named 'cls'
Usually first parameter of a method is named 'self'
Usually first parameter of such methods is named 'cls'
Usually first parameter of such methods is named 'cls'
